com.hazelcast.config.PermissionConfig

Packages that use PermissionConfig 
Package Description
com.hazelcast.config
Provides classes for configuring HazelcastInstance.
com.hazelcast.security
Provides interfaces/classes for Hazelcast security implementation.

    Methods in com.hazelcast.security that return types with arguments of type PermissionConfig 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Set<PermissionConfig> SecurityService.getClientPermissionConfigs()

    Method parameters in com.hazelcast.security with type arguments of type PermissionConfig 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void SecurityService.refreshClientPermissions​(Set<PermissionConfig> permissionConfigs)
    Propagates changes made to client permissions to all members and reinitiates IPermissionPolicy with new configuration.
    void IPermissionPolicy.refreshPermissions​(Set<PermissionConfig> permissionConfigs)
    Replaces existing permissions with given set of permissions.
